## CodeBlockExtensionOptions interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CodeBlockExtensionOptions extends NodeExtensionOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [defaultLanguage](./extension-code-block.codeblockextensionoptions.defaultlanguage.md) | <code>string</code> | The default language to use when none is provided. |
|  [formatter](./extension-code-block.codeblockextensionoptions.formatter.md) | <code>CodeBlockFormatter</code> | Provide a formatter which can format the provided source code. |
|  [keyboardShortcut](./extension-code-block.codeblockextensionoptions.keyboardshortcut.md) | <code>string</code> | A keyboard shortcut to trigger formatting the current block. |
|  [supportedLanguages](./extension-code-block.codeblockextensionoptions.supportedlanguages.md) | <code>RefractorSyntax[]</code> | Import languages from refractor |
|  [syntaxTheme](./extension-code-block.codeblockextensionoptions.syntaxtheme.md) | <code>SyntaxTheme &#124; false</code> | The theme to use for the codeBlocks. |
|  [toggleType](./extension-code-block.codeblockextensionoptions.toggletype.md) | <code>string</code> | The name of the node that the code block should toggle back and forth from. |
